snippet: The Atlanta school board on Monday approved Meria Carstarphen as the district’s next superintendent.
abstract: Atlanta school board approves Meria Carstarphen as district's next superintendent; Carstarphen takes post while several former educators, including a former superintendent, are being prosecuted in a cheating scandal.
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta school board on Monday approved Meria Carstarphen as the district’s next superintendent.

headline.main: Georgia: New Schools Chief for Atlanta
headline.print_headline: Georgia: New Schools Chief for Atlanta
